samples.question: So first question, how has modern transportation changed in the way people travel today compared to the past?
samples.transcript: >> Modern transportation definitely changed the way people travel nowadays. especially with airplanes, faster speed trains and the other way of traveling. So, it is safer, more efficient, and then it is fast, saves a lot of times. >> Definitely. Okay.
samples.transcript_original: >> Modern transportation definitely changed the way people travel nowadays. Um especially with airplanes, faster speed trains and the other way of traveling. So, it's safer, more efficient, and then it's uh fast, saves a lot of times. >> Definitely. Okay.

samples.question: If there is some tips to help when traveling, do you have any tips that could help others?
samples.transcript: >> Well, it depends where you want to go. let us say if I want to travel with my car, so I will make sure I have some tools in my car. So, if something breaks down, then I can fix my car on my way. If I am traveling, let us say I am going to Italy, so I want to I want to wear like comfortable clothes. I want to have comfortable shoes and then I want to have a bag, some other stuff that I need. >> Definitely. >> So, it is all depends where I am going and how I am traveling. >> Mhm.

Okay.
